abstract: Follow along with live updates from Game 4 of the American League divisional series between the Yankees and the Tigers.
snippet: Follow along with live updates from Game 4 of the American League divisional series between the Yankees and the Tigers.
lead_paragraph: After a strong start from A.J. Burnett, the Yankees used an offensive onslaught in the eighth inning to stave off elimination, winning 10-1 to force a Game 5 in New York.
